overview:
John Allison
John is an IT technology entrepreneur (since 1980) with international experience in software solutions, database and digital media networks. He is Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of LogicalTech Group, an ITC innovation incubator and services business with 25 years successful history. He is a Director of a number of technology companies, including several startups and also serves as a Director of a Not For Profit charity. John has over 35 years of business leadership experience, commercialisation and R&D management and has spent four years leading an international patented digital signage commercialization process from product concept to customer engagement in the US. Prior to this role, he led the two year business turnaround and successful sale of a public unlisted company with peak turnover of $35 million and over 220 professional services staff.
He has extensive expertise in leadership and management in IT, business services, and engineering. He brings skills in negotiation, communication, and business strategy and development through his experience in software technology, business consultancy, applied business solutions and extensive relationships with international partners. John is an honors graduate in Engineering and has worked with and for major IT corporations such as CSC in his career since 1972.
